query.name: com.powerschool.psu.academy508.studentlist
query.description: List of students on this server.
query.sql: select last_name, first_name, grade_level, CASE enroll_status WHEN 0 THEN 'A' WHEN 1 THEN 'I' WHEN -1 THEN 'P' ELSE 'O' END as enroll_stat, CASE ethnicity WHEN 'A' THEN 'Asian' WHEN 'B' THEN 'African-American' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Caucasian' WHEN 'H' THEN 'Hispanic' WHEN 'I' THEN 'American Indian' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pacific Islander' ELSE 'Unknown' END as ethnicity from students order by schoolid, grade_level desc, lastfirst

query.name: com.powerschool.psu.academy508.storedgrades
query.sql: select s.lastfirst, sg.grade_level, sg.course_number, sg.course_name, sg.storecode, sg.grade, sg.percent, sg.schoolid, sg.schoolname from storedgrades sg join students s ON s.id = sg.studentid order by s.lastfirst, sg.grade_level

query.name: com.powerschool.psu.academy508.reenrollments
query.description: Get a list of student enrollments
query.sql: select S.LASTFIRST, SCH.NAME, S.ENTRYDATE, S.ENTRYCODE, S.EXITDATE, S.EXITCODE FROM STUDENTS S JOIN SCHOOLS SCH ON SCH.SCHOOL_NUMBER = S.SCHOOLID UNION ALL select S.LASTFIRST, SCH.NAME, R.ENTRYDATE, R.ENTRYCODE, R.EXITDATE, R.EXITCODE FROM STUDENTS S JOIN REENROLLMENTS R ON R.STUDENTID = S.ID JOIN SCHOOLS SCH ON SCH.SCHOOL_NUMBER = R.SCHOOLID ORDER BY 1, 3, 5

query.name: com.powerschool.psu.academy508.test_results
query.description: Get a list of student test results
query.sql: SELECT s.lastfirst, t.name testname, st.test_date, st.grade_level, ts.name scorename, CASE WHEN to_char(sts.numscore) IS NULL OR to_char(sts.numscore) = '0' THEN 'N/A' ELSE to_char(sts.numscore) END numscore, CASE WHEN to_char(sts.percentscore) IS NULL OR to_char(sts.percentscore) = '0' THEN 'N/A' ELSE to_char(sts.percentscore) END percentscore, CASE WHEN sts.alphascore IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE sts.alphascore END alphascore FROM studenttest st INNER JOIN test t ON st.testid = t.id INNER JOIN testscore ts ON ts.testid = t.id INNER JOIN studenttestscore sts ON sts.studenttestid = st.id AND sts.testscoreid = ts.id INNER JOIN students s ON s.id = st.studentid order by st.test_date desc, t.name, st.dcid, ts.sortorder

query.name: com.powerschool.psu.academy508.test_results_args
query.description: Get a list of student test results
query.sql: SELECT s.lastfirst, t.name testname, st.test_date, st.grade_level, ts.name scorename, CASE WHEN to_char(sts.numscore) IS NULL OR to_char(sts.numscore) = '0' THEN 'N/A' ELSE to_char(sts.numscore) END numscore, CASE WHEN to_char(sts.percentscore) IS NULL OR to_char(sts.percentscore) = '0' THEN 'N/A' ELSE to_char(sts.percentscore) END percentscore, CASE WHEN sts.alphascore IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE sts.alphascore END alphascore FROM studenttest st INNER JOIN test t ON st.testid = t.id AND upper(t.name) = :testname INNER JOIN testscore ts ON ts.testid = t.id INNER JOIN studenttestscore sts ON sts.studenttestid = st.id AND sts.testscoreid = ts.id INNER JOIN students s ON s.id = st.studentid order by st.test_date desc, t.name, st.dcid, ts.sortorder
